summary: Taxpayer, a club that offers live music and dining, petitions for the correction of assessment of an assessment of retail sales tax, retailing business and occupation (“B&O”) tax, and deferred sales tax. We hold that Taxpayer is required to charge retail sales tax on its mandatory gratuities, is liable for deferred sales tax on construction services related to a remodel of its club, and is responsible to remit over-collected retail sales tax it collected in error. Taxpayer’s petition is denied.
